Articles.Content: I just wanted to say hello and welcome to my fellow Kerbonauts! Even though it says I joined in 2012, I have no idea why I even made an account as I never got on or made posts or anything and kind of just forgot about the whole thing. So I am going to use this as my introduction to the forums, and hopefully I can stay active this time. So before I end this, I wanted to ask one thing that is bugging me. Is there a way to get notifications from a thread you want to keep track of? Because I had made a thread about a problem I was having with 0.90.0 and I never got any notifications from it, so I had to keep manually checking back in. Well thank you for reading this and hopefully I enjoy my stay on the forum!

"Thread Tools", just above the first thread on a page. "Subscribe to this Thread" option.

Belated welcome to the forums.
welcome! The subscription tab is a good way to keep track of things.... especially since it automatically subscribes to threads you reply to.
Thanks for the tips and welcomings everyone.
